page.title: 12Jobs Around Boroughbridge
page.content: There is a wide range of jobs in Boroughbridge. There is carrefour the hypermarket, Farnells the electronic company. There are a range of shops including hairdressers,chemists,pet shops,news agents,cafes , restaurants, the Tuck shop,and a stationary shop. There is also a sports shop.The farms around make alot of work,with crops and farm animals.There is lots of seeding , havesting and turning over soil,with the animals they have to be fed and cleaned .There are many diffrent jobs in the town apart from shops such as estate agents,pubs,cafes, policeman and fireman.There are about three to four thousand people in Boroughbridge ,10% are on the dole, 5% are roaming the streets ,5% are sitting at home doing nothing.
